Bhātiyavanka vihāra：A monastery in Ceylon．A monk of the monastery，who once went to worship at the Mahā Thūpa，saw there some devatās also worshipping; they had been born in heaven as a result of having participated in the building of the thūpa （Mhv．xxx．46f）．

In the time of Dutthagāmanī，the chief incumbent of the vihāra was Mahānāga．MT．606．
